doc.title: Silvio Berlusconi's senate U-turn – in pictures
doc.author: Share
doc.description: As the day wore on it became clear that a significant portion of Berlusconi's party was going to defy his wishes and vote for the government to continue

main.head: Silvio Berlusconi's senate U-turn – in pictures
main.p: As the day wore on it became clear that a significant portion of Berlusconi's party was going to defy his wishes and vote for the government to continue
